answers.answer: Hope this conference will be a great success - because I have been busting my hindquarters to make a small part of it happen....May Diabetes be an occurrence of the past one day!

question: The world's most highly anticipated diabetes conference will take place in San Francisco today.The "San Francisco Gate" reports more than 13-thousand diabetes experts will join forces during the five-day event to discuss topics both scientific and social. Bay Area Doctors are expected to lead discussions about previous studies involving blood sugar control in patients.Dr. Marc Jaffe says the meetings might not wind up giving them all the diabetes answers they are looking for but, quote, "we'll have a lot more information. We want to be able to more definitively help out patients."Convention details:http://tinyurl.com/4b5a6w
title: Not a Question, Just Information
